column4: do you want to share the command that you have so far so we have a better idea of what you are trying to accomplish?
I'm using "wget -r -l 5 -I tst domain.com/dir/"  ok for "domain.com/dir/tst" but not for "domain.com/dir/directoryX/tst"
using 'find . -type d -name "tst"' seems to be an good idea but how I can execute that on domain.com/
i thought you were trying to accomplish something else. find wont work.
